column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Portions are very reasonable. Before you know it
column2: you're completely stuffed. I've tried a number of items on their menu. My three must haves here are the brussel sprout salad
column4: and paella. The paella is huge and two servings was definitely more than enough for five of us. Unless the paella is your entree and you have no desire to try anything else on their menu
column5: I would use 2-3 people per serving of paella as a guide.
